com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin

Class ServiceUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin.ServiceUtilities

  • public class ServiceUtilities
extends Object
    Provides various utility functionality dealing with GeneiousServices.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WritableDatabaseService getResultsDestination()
      Get the service to which results of the current operation will be saved.
      static GeneiousService getSelectedService()
      Get the currently selected service in the Geneious service tree on the left-hand side of the main window.
      static GeneiousService getService(String uniqueId)
      Calls PluginUtilities.getGeneiousService(String)
      static WritableDatabaseService getUserSelectedFolder(Component anyComponentInParentFrame)
      Opens a dialog in which the user can choose one of their local database folders.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectedService

        public static GeneiousService getSelectedService()
        Get the currently selected service in the Geneious service tree on the left-hand side of the main window.
        Returns:
        the currently selected service or null if no service is selected.

      • getResultsDestination

        public static WritableDatabaseService getResultsDestination()
        Get the service to which results of the current operation will be saved. This method may prompt the user if that is their preference or if the currently selected service is non-writable (e.g. NCBI search results)
        Returns:
        the service to which results of the current operation will be saved, null if the user cancels the select destination dialog (the action should be cancelled in this case)
        Since:
        API 4.51 (Geneious 5.5.1)

      • getUserSelectedFolder

        public static WritableDatabaseService getUserSelectedFolder(Component anyComponentInParentFrame)
        Opens a dialog in which the user can choose one of their local database folders.
        Parameters:
        anyComponentInParentFrame - a component whose parent frame will become the parent frame for the dialog (pass in null to use the Geneious main frame)
        Returns:
        the folder that the user selected, or null if cancelled

      • waitForGeneiousServiceInitializationToComplete

        public static void waitForGeneiousServiceInitializationToComplete()
        Waits until all GeneiousServices have been initialized. This means that GeneiousService.initialize(com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin.GeneiousServiceListener) has completed for all currently existing services. This method may not be called from the event dispatch thread.

      • getService

        public static GeneiousService getService(String uniqueId)
        Calls PluginUtilities.getGeneiousService(String)
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - a unique ID as described above or the unique ID returned from any GeneiousService.getUniqueID()
        Returns:
        the GeneiousService or null if it's not found (for example, not currently installed).
        See Also:
        PluginUtilities.getGeneiousService(String)
